full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO MGON DKAR YID BZHIN GYI NOR BU'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (CES BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO MGON DKAR YID BZHIN GYI NOR BU'I GA-YANG 'GUGS @013A *, ,AA PA KA GA-YON DU'I WANG GI SHOG ,AER TE NI PAndI TA MKHAN PO LHA RAMS PA NGAG DBANG YAR 'PHEL GYIS DAM PA GONG MA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS KYI CHO GA LA GZHIR BYAS STE SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SHOG GONG 'TRA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I ZHABS RDUNG NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS KYIS BRIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA RNAMS SBYIN PA'I PHAR PHYIN YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
